Jaipur Pink Panthers is a professional kabaddi team based in Jaipur, Rajasthan that competes in the Pro Kabaddi League.
Jaipur Pink Panthers are the champions of the first season of the Pro Kabaddi League in 2014.
Register and get a chance to win exclusive Jaipur Pink Panthers merchandise, meet and greet with the players and win home match tickets.
Stay tuned to our weekly contests on social media and stand a chance to win exclusive merchandise!
